name: CIM
description: Exposes the immediate context of a node in the CIM knowledge graph

name: Class hierarchy
Classes and Relations
expandQuery:
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX cims: <http://iec.ch/TC57/1999/rdf-schema-extensions-19990926#>
PREFIX sesame: <http://www.openrdf.org/schema/sesame#>
PREFIX onto: <http://www.ontotext.com/>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
construct {
    ?node1 ?rel1 ?node.
    ?node  ?rel2 ?node2.
    ?node3 rdfs:subClassOf ?node.
    ?node  rdfs:subClassOf ?node4.
}
from onto:explicit
where {
    {?rel1 a owl:ObjectProperty; rdfs:domain ?node1; rdfs:range ?node.  filter not exists {?rel1 cims:AssociationUsed "No"}} union
    {?rel2 a owl:ObjectProperty; rdfs:domain ?node;  rdfs:range ?node2. filter not exists {?rel2 cims:AssociationUsed "No"}} union
    {?node3 sesame:directSubClassOf ?node} union
    {?node  sesame:directSubClassOf ?node4}
}
description: Select a class (eg Switch or Equipment)

name: Lines and Voltage Levels (Telemark120 MV)
Substations and Lines (some)
resourceQuery:
PREFIX afn: <http://jena.apache.org/ARQ/function#>
PREFIX cim: <https://cim.ucaiug.io/ns#>
PREFIX sesame: <http://www.openrdf.org/schema/sesame#>
select * {
    ?node sesame:directType ?type; cim:IdentifiedObject.name ?name
    bind(concat(afn:localname(?type),"\n",?name) as ?label)
}

name: VoltageLevel
hint: Enter a cim:VoltageLevel node such as urn:uuid:f1769660-9aeb-11e5-91da-b8763fd99c5f
